original_text: Now he wants very much to see all of you again. He became very sad, because you heard the message that he was ill.
korean_text: 그가 너희 무리를 간절히 사모하고 자기가 병든 것을 너희가 들은 줄을 알고 심히 근심한지라

sentences.original_text: Now he wants very much to see all of you again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이제 다시 너희 모두를 보기를 매우 원한다.
